structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The treasurer shall receive all funds belonging to the chamber of commerce, including all appropriations of the city governing body. He shall pay out the same on bills allowed by the board of directors, upon warrants certified by the president and secretary.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2741n-9.
